alert.note: Alert for La Salle; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 1:53AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of La Salle and northwestern McMullen Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 152 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Woodward, or 9 miles southwest of Dilley, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cotulla, Gardendale, Woodward, Zella, Millett, Los Angeles and Fowlerton. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 60 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for south central Texas.
